name: Serene
appearance: Tall in salt-gray robes, head shaved, ink-bright eyes; ember-ink glows faintly along her wrist scars.
character: Composed and exacting; kindness meted by measure and covenant.
talents: still a crowd with a gaze
dreams: recover the lost covenants of Ashwell and cleanse the city archives
bind Whisperfen’s renegade echoes back into lawful keeping
teach a new generation to tithe fairly
secrets: traded three days of her own memory to seal a riot amnesty
knows the Gate Crown’s heart-cog hum answers the Basilica’s shard
has a list of clerks who siphon days, but revealing it would break faith
